Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") Mesh = Handle:WaitForChild("Mesh") ArrowScript = script:WaitForChild("ArrowScript") FaceChangeScript = script:WaitForChild("FaceChange")
ReloadArrow = Tool:WaitForChild("ReloadArrow")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris") ContentProvider = game:GetService("ContentProvider")
PlaySound = Tool:WaitForChild("PlaySound")
FireSound = Handle:WaitForChild("FireSound") HitSound = Handle:WaitForChild("HitSound")
QuackSounds = {Handle:FindFirstChild("Quack1"), Handle:FindFirstChild("Quack2"), Handle:FindFirstChild("Quack3"), Handle:FindFirstChild("Quack4")}
MouseDown = false Firing = false Animating = false
FireRate = 1.25 Range = 250 Power = 100 Rate = (1 / 30) WindVec = Vector3.new(2, -1, 1).unit
Grips = {NormalGrip = CFrame.new(0.125, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1), FiringGrip = CFrame.new(0.125, 0, -0.30625--[[-0.300000012]], 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1)}
Content = {BowAndArrow = 153674406, Bow = 153674416, Arrow = 153674424, Texture = 153674394}
for i, v in pairs(Content) do local NewContent = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=" .. tostring(v) Content[i] = NewContent ContentProvider:Preload(NewContent) end
function Round(Number, Round_Decimal) local Whole_Number, Decimal = math.modf(Number) return ((Decimal >= Round_Decimal and math.ceil(Number)) or (Decimal < Round_Decimal and math.floor(Number))) end
function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function CheckIntangible(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit) local LowercaseName = string.lower(Hit.Name) if character == Character or Hit.Transparency > 0.8 or string.sub(LowercaseName, 1, string.len("effect")) == "effect" or Hit.Name == "Bullet" or LowercaseName == "laser" or LowercaseName == "water" or LowercaseName == "rail" or LowercaseName == "arrow" then return true end end return false end
function CastRay(StartPos, Vec, Length, IgnoreList, DelayIfHit) local Hit, EndPos = game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(StartPos, Vec * Length), IgnoreList) if Hit and CheckIntangible(Hit) then if DelayIfHit then wait() end Hit, EndPos = CastRay((EndPos + (Vec * 0.01)), Vec, (Length - ((StartPos-EndPos).magnitude)), IgnoreList, DelayIfHit) end return Hit, EndPos end
function CreateArrow() Arrow = Instance.new("Part") Arrow.Name = "Arrow" Arrow.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Arrow.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Arrow.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic Arrow.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block Arrow.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Arrow.Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.5, 3.5) local ArrowMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") ArrowMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh ArrowMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) ArrowMesh.MeshId = Content.Arrow ArrowMesh.TextureId = Content.Texture ArrowMesh.Parent = Arrow ArrowWeld = Instance.new("Weld") ArrowWeld.Name = "ArrowWeld" ArrowWeld.Part0 = Arrow ArrowWeld.Part1 = Handle ArrowWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0.065, 0.075, 1.39) ArrowWeld.Parent = Arrow end
function DrawBeam(BeamStart, BeamEnd, Color, FadeDelay) local Distance = (BeamStart - BeamEnd).magnitude local Laser = Instance.new("Part") Laser.Name = "Laser" Laser.Anchored = true Laser.CanCollide = false Laser.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block Laser.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Laser.Size = Vector3.new( 0.2, 0.2, 0.2) Laser.Transparency = 5 Laser.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic Laser.Locked = true Laser.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Laser.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Laser.BrickColor = Color Laser.CFrame = CFrame.new(BeamEnd, BeamStart) * CFrame.new(0, 0, (-Distance / 2)) * CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, 0) local LaserMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") LaserMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, (Distance * 5), 1) LaserMesh.Parent = Laser Debris:AddItem(Laser, (FadeDelay * 3)) Laser.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace")
local Frames = math.floor(FadeDelay / Rate) for Frame = 1, Frames do wait(Rate) local Percent = (Frame / Frames) Laser.CFrame = (Laser.CFrame + (WindVec * Rate)) Laser.Transparency = (0.5 + (Percent * 0.5)) end Delay(1, function() Laser:Destroy() end) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Player or not Humanoid then return end if not Tool.Enabled then wait(FireRate) Tool.Enabled = true end if Mesh.MeshId == Content.BowAndArrow then CreateArrow() end Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() if not MouseDown and Tool.Enabled and not Animating then if not Arrow then Animating = true CreateArrow() local LeftArm = Character:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") if LeftArm then FakeArrow = Arrow:Clone() FakeArrow.Name = "FakeArrow" FakeArrowWeld = Instance.new("Weld") FakeArrowWeld.Name = "FakeArrowWeld" FakeArrowWeld.Part0 = FakeArrow FakeArrowWeld.Part1 = LeftArm FakeArrowWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, 1, 0) FakeArrowWeld.Parent = FakeArrow Debris:AddItem(FakeArrow, 5) FakeArrow.Parent = Handle end ReloadArrowAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(ReloadArrow) if ReloadArrowAnim then ReloadArrowAnim:Play() end wait(0.5) ReloadArrowAnim:Stop() if AnimDelay then AnimDelay:disconnect() end if FakeArrow then FakeArrow:Destroy() end Tool.Grip = Grips.NormalGrip Mesh.MeshId = Content.BowAndArrow Animating = false else MouseDown = true Firing = true Tool.Grip = Grips.FiringGrip Mesh.MeshId = Content.Bow Arrow.Parent = Handle Mesh.MeshId = Content.Bow DamageIncrease = 0 while MouseDown and Arrow and Arrow.Parent and ArrowWeld and ArrowWeld.Parent and ArrowWeld.C0.Z >= -0.95 do wait() ArrowWeld.C0 = ArrowWeld.C0 - Vector3.new(0, 0, 0.01) DamageIncrease = DamageIncrease + 0.1 end if ArrowWeld.C0.Z <= -0.95 then local Fire = Instance.new("Fire") Fire.Parent = Arrow end end end end) Mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() if MouseDown then MouseDown = false Firing = false if Arrow and Arrow.Parent then
Tool.Enabled = false
PlaySound.Value = FireSound.Name
local StartPos = Handle.Position local Vec = (Mouse.Hit.p - StartPos).unit
local Hit, EndPos = CastRay(StartPos, Vec, Range, Character, false) local FakeVec = (EndPos - StartPos).unit
if ArrowWeld and ArrowWeld.Parent then ArrowWeld:Destroy() end
Debris:AddItem(Arrow, 20) Arrow.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace")
HitSoundClone = nil
if Hit then local NewCF = CFrame.new(EndPos, (EndPos + FakeVec)) * CFrame.new(0, 0, 0.5) Arrow.CFrame = NewCF local Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Part0 = Hit Weld.Part1 = Arrow Weld.C0 = Hit.CFrame:inverse() * NewCF Weld.C1 = NewCF:inverse() * NewCF Weld.Parent = Arrow if Hit and Hit.Parent then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit) if character and character ~= Character and humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and Humanoid.Health > 0 then HitSoundClone = QuackSounds[math.random(1, #QuackSounds)]:Clone() UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage((Round(DamageIncrease, 0.05) + 1) * 4) if not humanoid:FindFirstChild(FaceChangeScript.Name) then local FaceChangeScriptClone = FaceChangeScript:Clone() FaceChangeScriptClone.Disabled = false FaceChangeScriptClone.Parent = humanoid end end if not HitSoundClone then HitSoundClone = HitSound:Clone() end HitSoundClone.Name = "HitSound" HitSoundClone.Parent = Arrow local ArrowScriptClone = ArrowScript:Clone() ArrowScriptClone.Disabled = false ArrowScriptClone.Parent = Arrow end else Arrow.CFrame = CFrame.new(EndPos, (EndPos + FakeVec)) Arrow.CFrame = Arrow.CFrame + Arrow.CFrame.lookVector * 1.25 Arrow.Velocity = (FakeVec * Power) end
Spawn(function() DrawBeam(StartPos, EndPos, BrickColor.new("Institutional white"), 0.25) end)
Arrow = nil
wait(FireRate)
Tool.Enabled = true
end end end) end
function Unequipped() if Firing then if Arrow and Arrow.Parent then Arrow:Destroy() end Arrow = nil end if FakeArrow and FakeArrow.Parent then FakeArrow:Destroy() end if ReloadArrowAnim then ReloadArrowAnim:Stop() end if AnimDelay then AnimDelay:disconnect() end MouseDown = false Firing = false Animating = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Arrow = script.Parent
HitSound = Arrow:FindFirstChild("HitSound")
HitSound:Play()

--Made by Luckymaxer
Humanoid = script.Parent Character = Humanoid.Parent Head = Character:FindFirstChild("Head") if Head then Face = Head:FindFirstChild("face") if Face then OriginalFace = Face.Texture Face.Texture = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=108213708" wait(20) Face.Texture = OriginalFace script:Destroy() end end

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") PlaySound = Tool:WaitForChild("PlaySound")
PlaySound.Value = ""
PlaySound.Changed:connect(function() if PlaySound.Value ~= "" then local Sound = Handle:FindFirstChild(PlaySound.Value) if Sound then Sound:Play() end PlaySound.Value = "" end end)

Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
